stages.name: Body Making
stages.content: Build the robot chassis and place motors in balanced positions.
stages.story_card: You are designing a race car body to glide through futuristic tracks.

stages.name: Circuit Building
stages.content: Connect IR sensors and motor driver board according to the color wiring guide.
stages.story_card: Your robot is learning to see black lines like laser roads in a neon city.

stages.name: Frame Assembly
stages.content: Mount wheels, motors, and caster to create a stable frame.
stages.story_card: You are building an explorer rover for a moon mission.

stages.name: Sensor Logic
stages.content: Attach ultrasonic module and test distance-trigger behavior.
stages.story_card: Your rover uses sound pulses like superhero radar to avoid meteors.
